title: help with my google pixel phone screen. Cant find anyone to fix in South Africa. Broken for 2 years
content: Hi, I need help with regards to my google pixel phone. I imported one a year or two ago and the screen has been brokn for 1-2 years as no one is able to fix it here in South Africa. The phone is unusable due to the screen being cracked and i need assistance where /how to fix it in South Africa. Or if there is any other means to do so? No one has the right screen or capabilities to fix it here. Is there an official dealer in SA that can fix it ? I need help. Tired of my phone just sitting here.
